introduction_english: Let's dive into the usage of "いっか", a term you might come across in conversations about family dynamics over dinner or when talking about household compositions.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "いっか" means "a family" or "household." It is used to refer to a whole family unit living together in one residence. Additionally, it can imply a household seen in terms of its members as a unit.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of the word "いっか" is "かてい," which also represents a family or household. However, "かてい" is often used specifically to emphasize the domestic aspect or home life of the group.
antonyms: 単身 : たんしん : alone
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the word "いっか" is "たんしん," which means "single" or "living alone." While "いっか" emphasizes a group living together, "たんしん" highlights the absence of such a group, focusing on a solitary lifestyle.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼の一家はパーティへ行った。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)の一家(いっか)はパーティへ行った。

translations.EN: His family went to the party.
translations.ES: Su familia fue a la fiesta.
translations.VI: Gia đình anh ấy đã đi dự tiệc.
translations.FR: Sa famille est allée à la fête.
translations.ZH: 他的家庭去参加聚会了。
translations.TL: Pumunta ang kanyang pamilya sa party.
translations.MY: သူ၏မိသားစုသည်ပါတီသို့သွားသည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 昨晩は一家団欒でした。
example_sentences.furigana: 昨晩(さくばん)は一家(いっか)団欒(だんらん)でした。

translations.EN: Last night, it was a family gathering.
translations.VI: Tối qua, có buổi sum họp gia đình.
translations.FR: Hier soir, c'était un rassemblement familial.
translations.NE: हिजो राति, यो एक पारिवारिक सभा थियो।
translations.BN: গত রাতে, এটি ছিল একটি পারিবারিক সমাবেশ।
translations.TL: Kagabi, nagkaroon ng pagtitipon ng pamilya.
translations.MY: မနေ့ညက မိသားစုအိမ်စည်းလုပ်ခဲ့ပါတယ်။
translations.HI: कल रात, यह एक पारिवारिक सभा थी।
translations.FA: شب گذشته، یک گردهمایی خانوادگی بود.

example_sentences.kanji: 私たちは一家旅行に行きます。
example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)たちは一家(いっか)旅行(りょこう)に行(い)きます。

translations.EN: We are going on a family trip.
translations.ID: Kami akan pergi berlibur bersama keluarga.
translations.VI: Chúng tôi đi du lịch gia đình.
translations.FR: Nous partons en voyage en famille.
translations.TL: Pupunta kami sa isang paglalakbay ng pamilya.
translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်တို့သည် မိသားစုခရီးသွားပါသည်။
translations.HI: हम पारिवारिक यात्रा पर जा रहे हैं।

example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)らは一(いっ)家(か)です。

translations.MY: သူတို့သည် မိသားစုတစ်ခုဖြစ်သည်။

a family.MY: မိသားစုတစ်စု
